skills.name: Svarog Watches Over You
desc:
Deals Physical DMG equal to **60%** of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to **60%** of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.
All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

skills.name: Promise, Not Command
desc:
After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **15%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **96%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **16%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **102%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **17%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **109%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **18%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **115%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **19%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **122%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **20%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **128%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **21%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **136%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra **23%**, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's **Counter** is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a **Counter**, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by **144%**. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced **Counter(s)** can take effect 2 time(s).

skills.name: Because We're Family
desc: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by 10%. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a **Counter**, dealing Physical DMG equal to **80%** of Clara's ATK.

skills.name: A Small Price for Victory
desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: A Tall Figure
eidolons.desc: Using Skill will not remove Marks of Counter on the enemy.

eidolons.name: A Tight Embrace
eidolons.desc: After using the Ultimate, ATK increases by 30% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Cold Steel Armor
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Family's Warmth
eidolons.desc: After Clara is hit, the DMG taken by Clara is reduced by 30%. This effect lasts until the start of her next turn.

eidolons.name: A Small Promise
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Long Company
eidolons.desc: After other allies are hit, Svarog also has a 50% fixed chance to trigger a Counter on the attacker and mark them with a Mark of Counter. When using Ultimate, the number of Enhanced Counters increases by 1.

skillTree.name: Kinship
skillTree.desc: When attacked, this character has a 35% fixed chance to remove a debuff placed on them.

skillTree.name: Under Protection
skillTree.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.
